allow: Bash(npx shadcn@latest add select input dropdown-menu -y)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Session 2A: Add polish enhancements with animations and loading states

- Add framer-motion, sonner, date-fns dependencies
- Create animation utilities \(page, container, item, modal variants\)
- Add skeleton loaders, loading button, and empty state components
- Add Toaster for toast notifications

Enhanced pages with animations and mobile responsiveness:
- Orders page: loading skeletons, staggered animations, mobile card view
- Transaction modal: 3 tabs with timeline, animated numbers
- Inquiry form: inline validation, success animation
- Audit page: stats cards, animated table rows, mobile view
- Approvals page: animated cards, success states on approve/reject
- Login page: animated persona selection, loading state
- User menu: role-colored avatar, toast on logout
- Terminology page: loading state, animated terms, reset confirmation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
2C.1: Add tenant types and registry

- TenantConfig, TenantFeatures, TenantTerminology types
- Currency and Locale types \(USD, MXN, EUR, GBP, CAD\)
- Default features and terminology constants
- Helper functions for currency/date formatting
- Tenant registry with TechCorp and RestaurantMX entries

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(CERTIFICADO"\)
2. calculation-engine.ts: Treat undefined isCertified as false \(non-certified
   default\) as additional safety

The derivation logic:
- Normalize: role.toUpperCase\(\).replace\(/\\s+/g, '' ''\).trim\(\)
- Check hasNoCertificado: includes ''NO CERTIFICADO'', ''NO-CERTIFICADO'', etc.
- Check hasCertificado: includes ''CERTIFICADO'' or ''CERTIFIED''
- isCertified = hasCertificado && !hasNoCertificado

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
